physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: "# 155 Jesse Shwayder, 1940's." On back of photograph: "#155 Jesse Shwayder holding incendiary bomb manufactured by Shwayder Bros during war c. early 1940's. L-R Emmet Heisler, Jesse Shwayder, seated, Louis Degen, Donor Samsonite Corporation, advertising dept."

mods.abstract: Jesse Shwayder holds an incendiary bomb manufactured by Shwayder Brothers during World War II. From left to right: Emmet Heisler, Jesse Shwayder, seated, Louis Degen. Two of the men in the photograph are unidentified. The Shwayders founded the Samsonite Corporation.
mods.note: Donated by Samsonite Corporation, advertising department.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
